title: Lack of 'levelling up'
itunes:title: Lack of 'levelling up'
description:
The Government's plan to reduce regional inequalities in the UK isn't working, according new analysis from Bloomberg. UK politics reporter Joe Mayes and EMEA News Director David Merritt tell us, if anything, London is looking stronger than in 2019 when Boris Johnson made the pledge. Plus: Bright Blue's Phoebe Arslanagic-Wakefield & Alex Veitch from the British Chambers of Commerce tell hosts Caroline Hepker and Yuan Potts the cost of living crisis needs action now. 

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
